message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.PL

The paper presents a general approach to batching computations for accelerators, which is a common optimization technique in machine learning and other data-intensive applications. The specific example used in the paper is the No U-Turn Sampler (NUTS), which is a workhorse algorithm in Bayesian statistics. This suggests that the paper is likely to be relevant to several sub-fields of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), distributed computing (cs.DC), software engineering (cs.SE), and programming languages (cs.PL).
